text: Vangjel Dule in 2011 Vangjel Dule (Ευάγγελος Δούλες/Evangelos Doules; born in 1968 in Gjirokastër)Biography from the official site of the Albanian Parliament (in Albanian) is a representative of the Greek minority in Albania.Albania: Controversial Ethnic Greek Mayor Seeks Re-Election "Vangjel Dule, the head of the ethnic Greek Union for Human Rights" He is from 2002 the chairman of the Unity for Human Rights Party, which represents the Greek communities in the Albanian parliament. Dule is a graduate of the University of Tirana where he studied English language. He is from 2001 a member of the Albanian government for Vlore County. In 2002–2006, as well as in 2007–2010, Dule was a member of the Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:People from Gjirokastër Category:Northern Epirotes Category:Albanian people of Greek descent Category:University of Tirana alumni Category:21st-century Albanian politicians
title: Vangjel Dule
